pages.text: The spiritual in overworld was relatively thin. Someone had once set up a teleport formation to search for a place rich in spiritual in the distance. East world was one of them. Find the Teleport Ruin on the plain biome, collect enough Spiritual Stones to activate teleport anchors, and then you can teleport to east world.

The plains there have trading market, which can be an important source of secret manuals; the dark forest there is a strange place, where little-known structures may be found; and mysterious strange birds can be found in temperate plain.
